title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
2 points maximum

Justify (1 point)

· eDNA allows detection of the fish without visual identification/catching the fish.

Proposed advantage (1 point)

· Longer fragments indicate more recent presence of fish.

· Longer fragments are more likely to contain a sequence that is specific to silver carp.

· Longer sequences/more base pairs may increase accuracy/specificity/confidence that the eDNA is from a silver carp and not a related species.
